participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys engaging with children and sharing knowledge.
participant_1.background: for vacation i enjoy time at the beach. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. i'm an elementary school teacher. my parents were also teachers.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Contemplative and serene, dedicated to inner peace and mindfulness.
participant_2.background: i like meditation. i've not spoken in three months. i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i'm a buddhist.
